items.label: M.2
items.value: 1 x M.2 (Key E, 2230) with PCIe Gen4 x1 and USB 2.0 for Wireless

items.label: Controller/Speed
items.value: LAN1: Intel® I226V with 10/100/1000/2500 Mbps; LAN2: Intel® I219LM with 10/100/1000 Mbps, supports vPro

items.label: HDMI
items.value: HDMI 2.1 TMDS, Max resolution up to 4096 × 2160 @60Hz

items.label: Display Port
items.value: DisplayPort 1.4a, DP++ , Max resolution up to 4096 × 2160 @60Hz

items.label: LVDS
items.value: Dual channel 24 bit up to 1920 × 1200 @60Hz (Connector shared with eDP)

items.label: eDP
items.value: Max resolution up to 1920 × 1080 @60Hz (Connector shared with LVDS)

items.label: M.2
items.value: 1 x M.2 (Key M, 2242/2280) with PCIe Gen4 x4 for SSD

items.label: Power On
items.value: AT/ATX Supported – AT: Directly Power on as power input ready – ATX: Press button to PWR on after power input ready

items.label: Display Ethernet
items.value: 1 x 1 Gigabit LAN, 1 x 2.5 Gigabit LAN

items.label: USB
items.value: 1 x USB 3.2 Gen2x2 (Type-C, 5V/3A, Support DP 1.4a display output), 2 x USB 3.2 Gen2, 2 x USB 2.0

items.label: LVDS
items.value: 1 (Connector with LVDS/eDP signal, switch by BIOS)

items.label: Interface
items.value: Realtek ALC256 HD, High Definition Audio

items.label: Output
